title: Learning Data Viz by Doing Part 2 - Collecting the data
author: Nick Rosen
body: So I'm looking for historical weather data for San Diego, ideally a daily high, low and precipitation measurement and maybe humidity as well. Where do I start? Google, 'Bulk San Diego Historical wether data'. I didn't find any data sets that are ready to go but it looks like Weather Underground has all of the data I need and a url structure that should make scraping it pretty easy, hopefully there won't be some captcha thing that thwarts my scraper. I have a scraper I use for this sort of thing that came from googling nodejs web scraper, here's a link to learn to make your own .
